00123 const size_t        bits_per_digit    = std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00124 const size_t        digits_in_uintmax =
00125     (std::numeric_limits<boost::uintmax_t>::digits + bits_per_digit - 1) /
00126     bits_per_digit;
00127 const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00128 const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00129 const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00130 const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);

00236 class temp_t: public base_integer {
00237     public:
00238     explicit temp_t(const base_integer& b) {
00239         flags = b.flags;
00240         data = b.data;
00241         ++data->copies;
00242     }
00243 
00245     temp_t(const base_integer& b, size_t realloc_size):
00246         base_integer(b._is_fixed()
00247             ? allocate_fixed(b.data->fixed_mask, b._fixed_digits(), realloc_size)
00248             : allocate(realloc_size)) { }
00249 };

00334 class fixed_integer_any: public detail::base_integer {

00342     template <typename T> fixed_integer_any(const T& n,
00343         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0,
00344         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type* = 0):
00345         base_integer(detail::digits_in_uintmax, detail::digit_mask)
00346         { _set_signed(n); }
00347 
00348     template <typename T> fixed_integer_any(const T& n,
00349         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0,
00350         typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type* = 0):

00375 template <class T>
00376 class base_divide_t {
00377     public:
00378     base_divide_t() { }
00379     base_divide_t(const T& q, const T& r): quotient(q), remainder(r) { }
00380     base_divide_t(const base_divide_t<T>& copy):
00381         quotient(copy.quotient), remainder(copy.remainder) { }
00382     base_divide_t(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(base_divide_t) move) {
00383         quotient._swap(move.quotient); remainder._swap(move.remainder); }
00384 
00385     base_divide_t& operator=(BOOST_XINT_COPY_ASSIGN_REF(base_divide_t) copy)
00386         { quotient = copy.quotient; remainder = copy.remainder; return
00387         *this; }
00388     base_divide_t& operator=(BOOST_XINT_RV_REF(base_divide_t) move) {
00389         quotient._swap(move.quotient); remainder._swap(move.remainder); return
00390         *this; }
00391 
00392     T quotient, remainder;
00393 
00394     private:
00395     BOOST_XINT_COPYABLE_AND_MOVABLE(base_divide_t)
00396 };

00410 namespace detail {
00411 
00412 template <typename T>
00413 size_t log2(const T& n,
00414     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0,
00415     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type* = 0)
00416 {
00417     size_t lo=0, hi=std::numeric_limits<T>::digits;
00418     while (lo < hi) {
00419         size_t s = lo + ((hi - lo) >> 1);
00420         if (n >= (T(1) << s)) lo = s + 1;
00421         else hi = s;
00422     }
00423     return lo;
00424 }
00425 
00426 template <typename T>
00427 size_t log2(const T& nn,
00428     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0,
00429     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type* = 0)
00430 {
00431     typedef typename boost::make_unsigned<T>::type uT;
00432     return log2(static_cast<uT>(nn < 0 ? -nn : nn));
00433 }
00434 
00435 template <typename T>
00436 T to(const base_integer& n) {
00437     if (compare(n, fixed_integer_any((std::numeric_limits<T>::min)())) < 0
00438         || compare(n, fixed_integer_any((std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())) > 0)
00439             throw exceptions::too_big("value out of range for requested "
00440                 "conversion");
00441 
00442     T rval = 0;
00443     size_t len=n._get_length();
00444     for (size_t x=0; x<len; ++x) {
00445         if (sizeof(T) > sizeof(detail::digit_t)) rval <<= detail::bits_per_digit;
00446         rval += static_cast<T>(n._get_digit(len - x - 1));
00447     }
00448     if (n._get_negative()) rval = -rval; // Bogus MSVC warning C4146
00449     return rval;
00450 }
00451 
00452 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00453 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00454     traits>& out, const base_integer& n)
00455 {
00456     int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00457         : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00458         : 10);
00459     bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00460 
00461     int nsign = (n._is_zero() ? 0 : n._get_negative() ? -1 : 1);
00462     if ((out.flags() & std::ios::showpos) && nsign >= 0) out << "+";
00463 
00464     if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00465         if (nsign < 0) out << "-";
00466 
00467         if (base==16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00468         else if (base==16) out << "0x";
00469         else if (base==8) out << "0";
00470 
00471         if (n._get_negative()) {
00472             out << to_string(neg_t(n), base, upperCase);
00473         } else {
00474             out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00475         }
00476     } else {
00477         out << to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00478     }
00479     return out;
00480 }
00481 
00482 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00483 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00484     traits>& in, base_integer& n)
00485 {
00486     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00487     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00488     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00489     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00490 
00491     size_t base=autobase;
00492     if (count==1) {
00493         if (hex) base=16;
00494         else if (oct) base=8;
00495         else base=10;
00496     } else if (count>1) base=10;
00497     // else auto-base
00498 
00499     std::string s;
00500     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00501         in.ignore();
00502     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00503         in.ignore();
00504         s.push_back('-');
00505     }
00506 
00507     if (base==autobase) {
00508         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00509             in.ignore();
00510             int c=in.peek();
00511             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00512                 in.ignore();
00513                 base=16;
00514             } else base=8;
00515         } else base=10;
00516     }
00517 
00518     while (in) {
00519         int c=in.peek();
00520         if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00521             (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00522             (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00523                 (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00524         {
00525             in.ignore();
00526             s.push_back(char(c));
00527         } else break;
00528     }
00529 
00530     try {
00531         detail::from_string(n, s, base);
00532     } catch (std::exception&) {
00533         // Catch invalid strings
00534         in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00535     }
00536 
00537     return in;
00538 }
00539
